title: v0.1.1 - basically done, but still no CSS (or most anything else)
author: Millwr1ght
content:
• Added when the site was last updated to the footer
  • Fixed how the news and updates page renders
  • Fixed how APIs were being accessed/processed
  • Still don't know how the v0.0... system works, so imma keep making them up

title: v0.1 - My machine works! It really works!
author: Millwr1ght
content:
• All the basic functions of Wanderer work now! Movement, tile collisions, even autosave!
  • Never have to start over again
  • Fixed some broken links, so now you can really access this page of the site!

title: v0.0.5 - Tile Mapping News
author: Millwr1ght
content:
• Made a tilemap of game elements
  • Started the game loop
  • Added this page to the site!
